Author: karathracee
Text: That weather is no joke, it's super draining and it takes a lot of energy out of you. With the symptoms you listed, it sounds like eating something hot and simple to make was the smartest thing to do. Honestly, being outside that long in weather like that, your body was probably like, this is the end. I know it's easier said than done, but try not to blame yourself for eating like that when you were basically in a survival mindset.
